about_the_game: theHunter: Stealth Hunter DLC includes 3 months premium membership including full licenses to hunt All animals, access to All reserves, unlimited basic ammo and all gear that will help you remain undetected by the animals. Items included: Outback Shirt, Outback Pants, Outback Hat, Outback Boots, .22 "Plinkington" Semi-Automatic Rifle, 2-6x26mm Rifle Scope, Compound Bow “Pulsar”, 5 Pin Compound Bow Sight, Scent Eliminator and Face Paint.
detailed_description: theHunter: Stealth Hunter DLC includes 3 months premium membership including full licenses to hunt All animals, access to All reserves, unlimited basic ammo and all gear that will help you remain undetected by the animals. Items included: Outback Shirt, Outback Pants, Outback Hat, Outback Boots, .22 "Plinkington" Semi-Automatic Rifle, 2-6x26mm Rifle Scope, Compound Bow “Pulsar”, 5 Pin Compound Bow Sight, Scent Eliminator and Face Paint.
name: theHunter - Stealth Hunter

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows ® 10/8/7/

  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 8800, ATI/AMD Radeon HD 2400 (NVidia GeForce 8800, ATI/AMD Radeon HD 2400)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
